elements.name: Verifying book hotel with special request and gst using debit and credit card

steps.name: User is on OMRBranch hotel page
User enter "akashka888@gmail.com" and "Akash@123"
User should verify success message after login "Welcome Akash"
User search hotels "Tamil Nadu","Chennai","Studio","2023-05-29","2023-05-31","2-Two","2-Two" and "1"
User should verify after search hotel success message "Select Hotel"
User select first hotel and save the hotel name and price
User accept the alert message
User should verify after accepting the alert success message "Book Hotel"
User add all guest details "Mr.","Akash","k a","8489608783" and "akashka888@gmail.com"
User add gst details "9043592058","Greens Tech OMR Branch" and "Thoraipakkam"
User giving  special request "Camp Fire"
user proceed payment "Debit Card"

elements.name: Verifying book hotel with special request and gst using debit and credit card

steps.name: User is on OMRBranch hotel page
User enter "akashka888@gmail.com" and "Akash@123"
User should verify success message after login "Welcome Akash"
User search hotels "Tamil Nadu","Chennai","Studio","2023-05-29","2023-05-31","2-Two","2-Two" and "1"
User should verify after search hotel success message "Select Hotel"
User select first hotel and save the hotel name and price
User accept the alert message
User should verify after accepting the alert success message "Book Hotel"
User add all guest details "Mr.","Akash","k a","8489608783" and "akashka888@gmail.com"
User add gst details "9043592058","Greens Tech OMR Branch" and "Thoraipakkam"
User giving  special request "Camp Fire"
user proceed payment "Credit Card"
